content.question: Which of the following claims regarding the migration trends depicted in the graph would an African American Studies scholar support?

choices.label: White landowners often helped facilitate the migration of Black Americans to the North.
Increased job opportunities made Afro-Caribbean migration to the United States possible.
Some African Americans argued that emigration to Africa was necessary to escape racism in the United States.
The Black press was instrumental in encouraging African Americans in the South to migrate to the North.

content.answer: The Black press was instrumental in encouraging African Americans in the South to migrate to the North.
